Posts.Content: ewitaki wrote: Hi, everyone. I was diagnosed on Dec. 23, 2008 with IDC Stage IIb(?), with 7/20 lymph nodes, EP+, ER+, HER2-. I had bilateral mastectomy on Jan. 15, 2008. I have not started yet any therapies but I am very much worried that I won't make it. I am 46 years old, and have two 10 year old boys. Ladies, please send some info Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed and had bi-lat mastectomy. ewitaki Dawnmrn1
